title: Saticoy Apartments...TWO BEDROOMS IN THE CITY OF RESEDA!! CALL NOW!
posting_body: Saticoy Apartments is a charming building with an oceanic architectural motif in the city of Reseda.
We have a two bedroom apartment available for immediate occupancy.
Community benefits include professionally managed, control access entry, swimming pool, laundry onsite, and friendly onsite manager.
Unit benefits include ceiling fan, air conditioner, fresh paint, stove, and new flooring.
We are close to public transportation, major freeways, and shopping and dining.
We are a short distance to Ralphs, Vons, Home Depot, and Rite-Aid.
Please call to schedule a viewing.
cats are allowed with an additional deposit.
Pictures in this ad are a representation and may not reflect the actual apartment that is currently available.
Professionally managed by Statewide Enterprises, Inc. (A+ rated by the Better Business Bureau).
To View a virtual tour of unit 28-07 - 2Bed/1Bath - <URL>
-Quoted security deposit is on approved credit .
-6 or 12 month lease - Six month lease available with $200 monthly surcharge .
The rent, deposit, concession and terms listed in this ad are only valid for the actual date that this ad was initially posted.
